name: Halibut Florentine
author: Kimberly
summary: Halibut in a cheesy sauce over spinach. This is SO easy and the halibut comes out moist and flaky. Great for company because it's fancy but simple to make!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a saucepan over medium heat, cook and stir the Cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, and milk until melted and well blended
Mix in the flour and water, stirring constantly, until thick and smooth
Layer the spinach in the bottom of a baking dish
Arrange the halibut steaks over the spinach, and season with salt and pepper
Pour the cheese sauce mixture over the halibut
Bake 45 minutes in the preheated oven, until the fish flakes easily with a fork
